data.lyric:
[ti:Ballin' (Explicit)]
[ar:DJ Mustard/Roddy Ricch]
[al:Perfect Ten (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Ballin' (Explicit) - Mustard/Roddy Ricch
[00:06.18]Lyrics by：Dijon McFarlane/Shah Rukh Zaman Khan/Rodrick Wayne Moore, Jr.
[00:12.37]Composed by：Dijon McFarlane/Shah Rukh Zaman Khan/Rodrick Wayne Moore, Jr.
[00:18.56]Mustard on the beat ho
[00:19.13]I put the new Forgis on the Jeep
[00:21.56]I trap until the bloody bottoms is underneath
[00:23.94]'Cause all my n***as got it out the streets
[00:26.44]I keep a hundred racks inside my jeans
[00:28.71]I remember hittin' the mall with the whole team
[00:31.06]Now a n***a can't answer calls 'cause I'm ballin'
[00:33.63]I was wakin' up gettin' racks in the morning
[00:36.05]I was broke now I'm rich these n***as salty
[00:38.59]All these designer on my body got me drip drip ayy
[00:41.44]Straight up out the Yajects I'm a big Crip
[00:43.64]If I got a pint of lean I'ma sip sip
[00:45.85]I run the racks up with my queen like London and Nip
[00:48.38]But I got rich on all these n***as I didn't forget back
[00:51.09]I had to go through the struggle I didn't forget that
[00:53.52]I hop inside of the Maybach and now I can sit back
[00:56.15]These b***hes know me now 'cause I got them big racks
[00:58.60]'Cause I'm gettin' money now I know you heard that
[01:00.99]Young n***a on the corner b***h I had to serve crack
[01:03.38]Uncle fronted me some P's had to get them birds back
[01:05.91]We came up on dirty money I gave it a birdbath
[01:08.29]Cut off the brain and I give my b***h a new coupe
[01:10.75]Either you frontin' y'all gang or you're suwoop
[01:13.14]Got a New Orleans b***h and man that p***y voodoo
[01:15.64]And I'm that n***a now who knew
[01:18.38]I put the new Forgis on the Jeep
[01:20.89]I trap until the bloody bottoms is underneath
[01:23.32]'Cause all my n***as got it out the streets
[01:25.81]I keep a hundred racks inside my jeans
[01:28.12]I remember hittin' the mall with the whole team
[01:30.52]Now a n***a can't answer calls 'cause I'm ballin'
[01:32.93]I was wakin' up gettin' racks in the morning
[01:35.49]I was broke now I'm rich these n***as salty
[01:38.33]I been wakin' up to get the money woah woah
[01:40.77]Got a bad b***h her a*s tatted woah woah
[01:43.25]Givenchy to my toes two twins I'm f**king 'em both
[01:45.55]I put in a new AP the water like a boat
[01:48.01]I was down bad on my d**k where was you n***as at
[01:50.26]I know you turned your back on me just to get some racks
[01:52.74]I see you swerve back 'cause I'm in the black 'Bach
[01:55.24]New diamonds on me f**k a flash this ain't Snapchat
[01:57.69]'Cause I been gettin' paid
[01:59.41]Yellow diamonds on me look like lemonade
[02:01.88]Grab my baby mama that new Bentayga
[02:04.32]Tryna get the dojo like a sensei yeah
[02:06.81]Rolls Royce umbrellas when I'm in the rain
[02:09.56]I just mind my business
[02:11.24]I got brothers that did the time I ain't kiddin'
[02:13.77]All these rappers just talk about it I live it
[02:16.25]Goin' up I ain't got no sky limit yeah yeah yeah
[02:17.82]I put the new Forgis on the Jeep
[02:20.36]I trap until the bloody bottoms is underneath
[02:22.74]'Cause all my n***as got it out the streets
[02:25.22]I keep a hundred racks inside my jeans
[02:27.44]I remember hittin' the mall with the whole team
[02:29.85]Now a n***a can't answer calls 'cause I'm ballin'
[02:32.35]I was wakin' up gettin' racks in the morning
[02:34.83]I was broke now I'm rich these n***as salty
[02:39.24]I ayy yeah
[02:41.68]I've been ballin' lil' n***a
[02:44.12]Now watch me ball on these n***as
[02:46.13]Yeah now watch me ball on these n***as yeah
[02:49.06]Now watch me ball on these n***as
[02:51.43]Now watch me ball on these n***as yeah yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Ballin' (Explicit)]
[ar:DJ Mustard/Roddy Ricch]
[al:Perfect Ten (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.18]//
[00:12.37]//
[00:18.56]Mustard制作
[00:19.13]我给吉普车装上崭新的Forgis车胎
[00:21.56]我要继续做生意 直到我穿得起红底鞋
[00:23.94]我街区的兄弟们都穿着那种鞋
[00:26.44]我的牛仔裤里揣着很多票子
[00:28.71]记得以前 我和整个团队一起逛商场
[00:31.06]现在没时间接电话 因为我在狂欢
[00:33.63]早晨一睁开眼 钱就到手了
[00:36.05]以前我很穷 现在很有钱 对手们都嫉妒我
[00:38.59]穿着名牌衣服 我时髦帅气
[00:41.44]从小住在经济适用房中 向crip致敬
[00:43.64]如果来一点混合饮料 我会细细品味
[00:45.85]我和我的女人一起努力 共同致富
[00:48.38]兄弟们的恩情我永生难忘 我回来了
[00:51.09]以前吃过的那些苦 我没有忘记
[00:53.52]我跳进迈巴赫 现在可以好好休息一下了
[00:56.15]这些女人都认识我 因为我有大捆现金
[00:58.60]因为我现在有钱了 我知道你听到了
[01:00.99]角落里的各位年轻朋友 姑娘们 我准备开张做生意了
[01:03.38]叔叔给了我一些钱 让我给他带几个姑娘回来
[01:05.91]我们发家致富的那些钱来路不明 
[01:08.29]姑娘对我言听计从 我给她买了辆新车
[01:10.75]不管你声称自己来自血帮 还是其他帮派
[01:13.14]她的美丽和性感让我失魂落魄
[01:15.64]我现在就是那个牛人 谁知道呢 
[01:18.38]我给吉普车装上崭新的Forgis车胎
[01:20.89]我要继续做生意 直到我穿得起红底鞋
[01:23.32]我街区的兄弟们都穿着那种鞋
[01:25.81]我的牛仔裤里揣着很多票子
[01:28.12]记得以前 我和整个团队一起逛商场
[01:30.52]现在没时间接电话 因为我在狂欢
[01:32.93]早晨一睁开眼 钱就到手了
[01:35.49]以前我很穷 现在很有钱 对手们都嫉妒我
[01:38.33]早晨一睁开眼 钱就到手了
[01:40.77]认识一个女孩 她身上有纹身
[01:43.25]脚上穿着纪梵希的鞋 我把两个双胞胎姐妹同时追到手
[01:45.55]我戴上新的爱彼手表 上面镶满钻石
[01:48.01]我对我自己很失望 兄弟们都到哪去了
[01:50.26]我知道你是为了追求财富而背叛了我
[01:52.74]我看见你开车经过 我开着黑色的迈巴赫
[01:55.24]我戴上新的钻石 闪闪发光 没有用snapchat修图
[01:57.69]因为我现在赚大钱了
[01:59.41]黄色钻石戴在我身上 颜色像柠檬水
[02:01.88]给我的姑娘买辆新Bentayga
[02:04.32]试着从各种渠道进货
[02:06.81]下雨时我撑着劳斯莱斯的雨伞
[02:09.56]我只用管好自己的事
[02:11.24]我不是在开玩笑 我有很多好兄弟
[02:13.77]所有饶舌歌手都在吹牛 而我真的过得很奢侈
[02:16.25]去吧 我的人生没有极限
[02:17.82]我给吉普装上崭新的forgis
[02:20.36]我要继续做生意 直到我穿得起红底鞋
[02:22.74]我街区的兄弟们都穿着那种鞋
[02:25.22]我的牛仔裤里揣着很多票子
[02:27.44]记得以前 我和整个团队一起逛商场
[02:29.85]现在没时间接电话 因为我在狂欢
[02:32.35]早晨一睁开眼 钱就到手了
[02:34.83]以前我很穷 现在很有钱 对手们都嫉妒我
[02:39.24]我
[02:41.68]我一直很潇洒 兄弟
[02:44.12]看我怎么对付这些对手
[02:46.13]看我怎么对付这些对手
[02:49.06]看我怎么对付这些对手
[02:51.43]看我怎么对付这些对手
